title: Lunar Revel shop is bugged
body:
I had a Lunar revel riven skin for 30% off when i first checked, went to bed woke up
and it was missing i clicked on the tile to reveal guardian of the sands skarner for 20% off, what the fuck i was literally going to buy the riven skin.

replies.body: As I understand they replaced any skins that are going to be on sale either this month or next month.
good. an adequate punishment for a riven player. not a player of the champ but the type of person i know you are
i just like the skin, and no im not the toxic kind.

Yeah i had the same problem with Dragonblade riven and mafia jinx, i opened it went to sleep and they both turned into firecracker jinx and battle bunny riven and i was going to buy Dragonblade riven, please fix rito
